miaDash.Rmd

Introduction

Motivation

Interface

Tutorial

Installation 

remotes::install_github("RiboRings/miaDash")

Example 

library(miaDash)

app <- miaDash()

# Launch miaDash
if (interactive()) {
  shiny::runApp(app)
}

Resources

Citation

We hope that miaDash will be useful for your research. Please use the following information to cite the package and the overall approach. Thank you!

## Citation info
citation("miaDash")

#> package DESCRIPTION file
